content.raw:
Running from prerelease, with
~~~
roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch
~~~
and
~~~
rosrun rviz rviz
~~~
configured to view stereo point cloud, cameras and laser scan.

The simulation crashes after about 10 minutes:
~~~

content.html:
Running from prerelease, with

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch

and

rosrun rviz rviz

configured to view stereo point cloud, cameras and laser scan.

The simulation crashes after about 10 minutes:
